page.title: 11Family life in S. Clevedon
page.content: Local families enjoy{leisure}time at the Weekends. Saturday begins with a "lie in" followed by a leisurely breakfast. Some families then shop together others visit relatives or friends, yet more, some form of{ {exercise}such as{Swimming, BMX {racing, Fishing}or{Football,}some family members only acting as spectators in the latter. Another pursuit followed by many families is pet care. Most families have one or two{pets.}The most popular ones are cats dogs, budgies and rabbits. It is usually the children of the famlies who are responsible for the feeding, hygiene and exercise of the pets. Family evenings usually consist of visiting friends, watching T.V. or playing card games.
